title: Wedding-Event
description: Wedding events unite couples in love, marking the beginning of their lifelong journey. They include vows, ceremonies, receptions, and festivities, symbolizing commitment, unity, and joy.

title: Anniversery-Event
description: Anniversary events hold deep sentimental value, celebrating enduring commitment, success, or historical milestones. They involve meticulous planning, melodious tunes,and toasts to mark the occasion.

title: Birthday-party
description: Birthday party events celebrate the passage of time and personal growth. They typically involve cake, decorations, games, and gifts, creating a festive atmosphere all around the party.

title: Engagement-Event
description: Engagement events mark the beginning of a couple's journey to marriage. These celebrations often include a proposal, an engagement party, or both. They signify love and the start of wedding planning.

title: Baby-Shower
description: Baby shower events are joyful gatherings celebrating an expectant mother and her impending arrival. They feature games, gifts,love, support, and excitement for the upcoming addition to the family.

title: Retirement-event
description: Retirement events mark the culmination of a career and the beginning of a new chapter in one's life. They often include speeches, gifts, and well-wishes, celebrating dedication and achievements.
